subject: Frauds and Swindling
Soccer
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: Juventus Coach Antonio Conte is facing a 15-month ban after the Italian federation rejected his offer of a three-month suspension for his involvement in a match-fixing scandal.
snippet: Juventus Coach Antonio Conte is facing a 15-month ban after the Italian federation rejected his offer of a three-month suspension for his involvement in a match-fixing scandal.
